page.title: 13Lamb's Garage.
page.content:
{The Garage}in Biggin is owned by Mr. Lamb.The Garage has been built for 45 years.They repair things like:_
1.tractors 2.lorries 3.cars
Mr. Lamb has only worked in the Garage for 9 years. Mr Lamb employs 3 mechanics. When repairing vehicles they have to wear protective clothes like overalls, goggles and leather gloves. He does not sell diesel or petrol, but he has customers from all the surrounding villages, as he is well known in the area for{his expertise {in repairing heavy vehicles.
